title: Darkstream: Alt-Right or Alt Lite?
author: VD
content_html:
Tonight at 7 PM Eastern I’ll be doing a Darkstream in which we’ll be discussing the distinction between Alt-Right and Alt Lite, and why the latter is destined to be a transient stage.

UPDATE: the replay is here.
